articles.author: Wendy Lee
articles.title: WGA got a deal. When can Hollywood get back to work? - Los Angeles Times
articles.description: The Writers Guild of America and major studios reached a tentative agreement on Sunday night. But significant challenges remain before the entertainment industry can fully return to the business of making and promoting movies and TV shows.
articles.content:
Hollywood breathed a collective sigh of relief Sunday night when the Writers Guild of America and the major studios announced a tentative deal for a new contract.
The nearly five-month strike among … [+5499 chars]
